Judul: PROPOSED MARKETING STRATEGY FOR BUDI SEHAT
Abstrak:
Health is an essential right of every person. Good Health is the greatest blessing of life. Life is a weary burden to a person of broken health. The richest man with bad health always suffers and groans. Better health is central to human happiness and well-being. It also makes an important contribution to economic progress, as healthy populations live longer and more productive. Because of that IndonesiaÃ‚Â’s 1945 Constitution mandates that health insurance for its people, especially the poor and near-poor, is the responsibility of central and regional governments. The 1945 Constitutional Amendment Article 34, paragraph 2 says that states must develop a system of social assistance for all Indonesian people. In 2004, the government passed Law Number 40 on the National Social Assistance Systems / Sistem Jaminan Sosial Nasional (SJSN) to provide comprehensive social assistance to help meet people's basic needs for equality and prosperity. To meet these criteria, government established Badan Penyelenggara Jaminan Sosial (BPJS) on 1 January 2014. All Indonesian residents are required to participate by January 2019. 

Budi Sehat is a retail drug store that provides common medicines, generic medicines, and prescription medicines located in Bandung. Budi Sehat sales declining for the last two years and this condition should be analyzed whether the sales decline is caused by BPJS or something else. Budi Sehat never use marketing strategy since the beginning. 

In determine to find the best marketing strategy for Budi Sehat. Budi Sehat needs to analyze the internal and external business environment. Researcher using Marketing Mix, Segmenting, Targeting, Positioning (STP), Business Model Canvas as tools to identifying internal condition. To identify external condition, researcher used PESTEL, Porter Five Forces, and Market Research as tools. The root cause of Budi Sehat problem are to create and develop business model based on market needs and do business model to entering new market segment. Furthermore, Budi Sehat needs to develop and meet the customerÃ‚Â’s expectation in middle low and middle up segment. 

In developing the new marketing strategy, Budi Sehat uses SWOT Analysis, TOWS Analysis, new STP, new Business Model Canvas, and some strategy formulation. This research hopefully can increase sales for the company, improving and developing internal processes and improve performance.
